items.title: How to coach yourself to master Abundance mindset & Prosper

visible_instructors.title: Julia Shantal
visible_instructors.name: Julia
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur/ Style & Performance Coach/ Meditation Teacher

items.headline: How to manifest financial abundance in your life
objectives_summary: Mindset is a critical component of success in business, sports and life in general.

Most people, particularly in the corporate world, have been conditioned to have a scarcity mentality. It's no wonder when promotions and raises are scarce, resources are limited, managers hoard information, micromanagement abounds, and generally, short-term thinking is the norm. A scarcity mentality is what keeps many of us from achieving our goals. An abundance mindset refers to the paradigm that there is plenty out there for everybody.   The next question is, how can we make the shift from a scarcity to an abundance mindset?
In this short course, students will learn how to develop financial mindset.
